title: A Dreadful Game
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss what they make of Yordan Àlvarez and the Mariners deciding to walk him, their takeaways from Thursday night’s dreadful Bears/Commanders game and David Pollack joins for 5 Good Minutes. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: Last night's Bears/Commanders game and the Mariners walk Yordan Àlvarez.
